item.title: Version 2.11.6 : Fix bug
item.content:encoded:
Bug fix

  • fix bug with lup-decomposition of rationals (an abs missing)

item.title: Version 2.11.5 : Pretty print
item.content:encoded:
Bug fix

  • improve display of floats precision to 10 decimal points (with rationalization it's possible)

Pretty print matrices

  • change the way of matrices pretty printed, matrices are aligned

item.title: Version 2.11.4 : Exact rational math
item.content:encoded:
Exact math

  • add automatic rationalization of floats (with 10 decimal point of precision)

Preparation

  • preparation for litteral calculations

Bug fix

  • remove prior forgotten debug message while allocating variable

item.title: Version 2.11.3
item.content:encoded:
Matrices

-- change the matrix pretty print

Bug fix

-- fix bug when re-allocating the variable (i.e you can't)

item.title: Version 2.11.2 : Pretty print
item.content:encoded:
Matrices

  • matrices and vectors pretty print

item.title: Version 2.11.1 : Exact rational math
item.content:encoded:
Bug fix

  • Fix bug when reducing rational with two minus or two whole numbers

Modification

  • Int and not floats to the matrix inversion algorithm, so it can invert with exact values

item.title: Version 2.11.0 : Exact rational math
item.content:encoded:
Exact math

  • Added exact rational math
  • Rational operation
  • Rational reduction

Bug fix

  • fix bug with acos,asin,atan functions while vectorize

item.title: Version 2.10.0 : Add function vectorization
item.content:encoded:
Function

Add vectorization to

  • cos
  • sin
  • tan
  • cosh
  • sinh
  • tanh
  • acos
  • asin
  • atan
  • exp
  • ln/log
  • sqrt

item.title: Version 2.9.10 : Fix bug, vector plotting
item.content:encoded:
Plot

  • add vector plotting

Terminal plot

  • fix edge case by changing the coefficient a little bit
  • add vector termploting

item.title: Version 2.9.9 : Terminal plot
item.content:encoded: • fix bug if yscale or xscale is 0
• Test
• Adds supports for dist-upgrade

item.title: v2.9.4 Terminal plot
item.content:encoded:
Terminal plot

  • fix bug while updating ymax and ymin

item.title: v2.9.3 Terminal plot
item.content:encoded:
Terminal plot

  • fix bug with the x axis row

item.title: v2.9.2 Terminal plot
item.content:encoded:
Terminal plot

See #25

  • fix f(x) = x bug
  • add auto scaling on y axis when termplot
  • add labels on y axis

item.title: v2.9.1 Terminal Plot!
item.content:encoded:
Terminal plot

  • Add terminal ploting
    • Calculate ploting height and width
    • Computes individual points
    • Generate each line
    • Prints each line

item.title: v2.9.0 Plot!
item.content:encoded:
Plot!

  • fix bug when re-defining functions

  • added plot

  • added string

  • Plot functions (both stdlib, and runtime) would be useful and appreciated. Plotting is powered by gnuplot, it will works on Unix-like (MacOS, Linux) but I don't have any idea about Windows

  • Plot stdlib functions

  • [X] Plot runtime functions

  • Save plot to png/svg/pdf

item.title: v2.8.1 Auto-completion
item.content:encoded: • Auto-completion

item.title: v2.8.0 Interactive config!
item.content:encoded:
Interactive config !

  • Interact with the configuration
    • Print current config
    • Reset config to default
    • [x] Set config
      • Set main color
      • Set prompt color
      • [x] Set prompt
      • Set greeting message
      • [x] Set greeting color
    • [X] Reload config

item.title: v2.7.0 Matrix algebra
item.content:encoded:
Matrix algebra

  • Matrix calculation
    • Add matrix to the datatypes
    • Lex matrices
    • Parse matrices
    • Add matrices operation
      • Matrix addition
      • Matrix multiplication
      • Calculate the matrix determinant
      • Calculate the reverse matrix

item.title: v2.6.0 Add vector calculation !
item.content:encoded:
Vector algebra

  • Vector calculation
    • Add vectors to the datatypes
    • Lex vectors
    • Parse vectors
    • Add vector operations
      • Dot product
      • Vector norm
      • Vector addition

item.title: v2.5.1 Bug fix
item.content:encoded: • fix error

item.title: v2.5.0 User defined function!
item.content:encoded:
User defined function

You can define your own function

item.title: v2.4.0 : Logic!
item.content:encoded:
Logic done

  • Add logic
    • Add basic true/false
    • Add binary operator
      • or (&&)
      • and (||)
      • >=
      • >
      • <=
      • <
      • ==
    • Add unary operator
      • not (!)

item.title: v2.3.1 More function
item.content:encoded:
More functions

  • sqrt
  • factorial (aliases: fact or !)
  • abs
  • ceil
  • floor
  • round

item.title: v2.3.0 Functions!
item.content:encoded:
Functions!

  • Add support for functions
    • exp
    • ln
    • log base a
    • cos/sin/tan
    • cosh/sinh/tanh
    • atan/acos/asin

item.content:encoded: Configuration update!

bug fix

item.content:encoded:
Builts in!
